name: Cognitive Operational Systems, Inc.
description: Developer of AI and computer vision technology designed to serve the retail and warehouse sector. The company's technology delivers scheduled physical inventory with minimal human intervention and utilizes deep learning methods for automated learning, exploring, and mapping of new environments, enabling retail businesses to improve inventory management operations in warehouses.
